data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 66 believers living in the state of Siliana. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Siliana, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 66 believers in Siliana and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Siliana, Tunisia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 222,098 who are far from you in Siliana, Tunisia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Bedouin, Rabiya people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Bedouin, Rabiya people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Bedouin, Rabiya people is yours.
Lord, the believers in the state of Siliana, Tunisia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Siliana, Tunisia to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Siliana words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
